analyticsScreen.title: Analytics
analyticsScreen.saleHistoryDescription: Sales and their statuses for the past time
analyticsScreen.revenueFromSalesDecription: Revenues from sales for the past time

connectionsScreen.title: My connections
connectionsScreen.noConnectionsInOwnNetwork: Ooops... Looks like you don't have any connections in your network

userConnectionsScreen.title: User connections
userConnectionsScreen.noConnectionsInNetwork: Ooops... Looks like this user don't have any connections in his/her network
userConnectionsScreen.partnerDescription: Here you will see completed sales that this manager have made recently, salary and other info.

errorScreen.title: Something went wrong!
errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: This is the screen that your users will see in production when an error is thrown. You'll want to customize this message (located in `app/i18n/en.json`) and probably the layout as well (`app/screens/error`). If you want to remove this entirely, check `app/app.tsx` for the <ErrorBoundary> component.
